docs.lead_paragraph: The policies provide income for later years if you come up short, but payments don’t begin until you reach a certain age.

headline.main: Live Long and Prosper? Insurance Might Help
headline.print_headline: Live Long and Prosper? Insurance Might Help

docs.abstract: Longevity insurance policies, or deferred-income annuities, can ease fears of outliving one's nest egg, but contracts can be costly and complicated; online tools exist to aid in decision.
docs.snippet: The policies provide income for later years if you come up short, but payments don’t begin until you reach a certain age.

docs.lead_paragraph: Dual-generation retirements are becoming more common because of longer life spans and children’s wrapping up their careers early.
docs.abstract: More baby boomers are joining their parents in retirement, trend called dual-generation retirements; longevity is among contributing factors, but trend may not continue unless people over 55 retire when their parents are still alive and many in that age group are choosing to work longer.
docs.snippet: Dual-generation retirements are becoming more common because of longer life spans and children’s wrapping up their careers early.

docs.lead_paragraph: Nearly 58, a writer has largely ignored his cursory efforts to plan for retirement. But his ignorance keeps gnawing at him, and it’s time to take a hard look at where he stands.

headline.main: Retirement Reality Is Catching Up With Me
headline.print_headline: Retirement Reality Is Catching Up With Me

docs.abstract: John Schwartz article recounts his experience finally planning for his and his wife's retirement after years of putting it off.
docs.snippet: Nearly 58, a writer has largely ignored his cursory efforts to plan for retirement. But his ignorance keeps gnawing at him, and it’s time to take a hard look at where he stands.

docs.lead_paragraph: Ferguson Police Chief Thomas Jackson resigned on Wednesday, effective March 19, and will receive a severance payment and one year of health insurance, the city said on Wednesday in a statement.

headline.print_headline: Resigning Ferguson Police Chief to Get Severance Payment: City

docs.snippet: Ferguson Police Chief Thomas Jackson resigned on Wednesday, effective March 19, and will receive a severance payment and one year of health insurance, the city said on Wednesday in a statement.

docs.lead_paragraph: Aides to top House Republicans and Democrats are trying to negotiate a bipartisan compromise to permanently revamp a law that annually threatens cuts in Medicare payments to doctors, including a 21 percent reduction set to take effect April 1.

headline.print_headline: House Leaders Looking for Deal to Halt Medicare Payment Cuts

docs.snippet: Aides to top House Republicans and Democrats are trying to negotiate a bipartisan compromise to permanently revamp a law that annually threatens cuts in Medicare payments to doctors, including a 21 percent reduction set to take effect April 1.

docs.lead_paragraph: The police chief of Ferguson, Missouri, resigned on Wednesday, following a scathing U.S. Justice Department report that found widespread racially biased abuses in the city's police department and municipal court.

headline.main: Ferguson Police Chief Resigns After Scathing Justice Department Report
headline.print_headline: Ferguson Police Chief Resigns After Scathing Justice Department Report

docs.snippet: The police chief of Ferguson, Missouri, resigned on Wednesday, following a scathing U.S. Justice Department report that found widespread racially biased abuses in the city's police department and municipal court.
